attributes.action: Change the driving test to include a compulsory cycling and motorcycling proficiency element
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a significant proportion of drivers that are antagonistic to cyclists and motorcyclists.  These peope are likely to have never experienced cycling or motocycling on the roads.  We petition the PM to make it compulsory that an element of cycling and motorcycling proficiency is included in the driving test to ensure newly qualified motor vehicle drivers have the correct perspective and understanding of what other modes of transport are like.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
